Sch.Cm: Электронная система управления документооборотом ЦЭД ИСА

Tbl.Cm: Таблица вариантов подготовки бакалавриата (академический или прикладной)
Таблица стран по ISO 3166-1 и ГОСТ 7.67-2003 и их телефонных кодов

Cl.Cm: Трёх буквенный код стран на латинице

Tbl.Cm: Таблица списка направлений бакалавриата (академический или прикладной)
Таблица списка профилей по направлениям подготовки

Cl.Cm: Определение кода по ISO на английском языке

View.Sql: SELECT laab.bachelor_id, aab.bachelor, laab.list_bachelor_id FROM list_academic_or_applied_bachelor laab JOIN academic_or_applied_bachelor aab ON aab.bachelor_id = laab.bachelor_id
SELECT lpt.training_programs_id, pt.profile_training FROM list_profile_training lpt JOIN profile_training pt ON pt.profile_training_id = lpt.profile_training_id

SELECT lst.training_programs_id, st.number_1, st.number_2, st.number_3, st.specialty_training FROM list_specialty_training lst JOIN specialty_training st ON st.specialty_training_id = lst.specialty_training_id
SELECT oa.order_admission_id FROM orders_admission oa WHERE oa.department = 1
SELECT lsiad.student_id, oai.order_admission_num, oai.date_of_order_admission FROM list_student_in_admission lsiad JOIN orders_admission oai ON oai.order_admission_id = lsiad.order_admission_id

SELECT lszt.training_programs_id, szt.specialization_training FROM list_specialization_training lszt JOIN specialization_training szt ON szt.specialization_training_id = lszt.specialization_training_id

SELECT ltd.training_programs_id, td.number_1, td.number_2, td.number_3, td.training_direction FROM list_training_direction ltd JOIN training_direction td ON td.training_direction_id = ltd.training_direction_id
SELECT ltpm.training_programs_id, tpm.training_programs_m FROM list_training_programs_master ltpm JOIN training_programs_master tpm ON tpm.training_programs_id = ltpm.training_programs_master_id

SELECT tps.training_programs_id, q.qualification, ap.academic_program, tps.duration_of_studies, lb.bachelor, ltd.number_1, ltd.number_2, ltd.number_3, ltd.training_direction, lpt.profile_training, ltpm.training_programs_m, st.number_1 AS num_1, st.number_2 AS num_2, st.number_3 AS num_3, st.specialty_training, szt.specialization_training FROM training_programs_students tps JOIN qualification q ON q.qualification_id = tps.training_programs_s JOIN academic_program ap ON ap.academic_program_id = tps.academic_program_id JOIN duration_of_studies dos ON dos.duration_of_studies = tps.duration_of_studies LEFT JOIN list_bachelor lb ON lb.list_bachelor_id = tps.training_programs_id LEFT JOIN list_tr_dir ltd ON ltd.training_programs_id = tps.training_programs_id LEFT JOIN list_prof_t lpt ON lpt.training_programs_id = tps.training_programs_id LEFT JOIN list_tra_prog_m ltpm ON ltpm.training_programs_id = tps.training_programs_id LEFT JOIN list_st st ON st.training_programs_id = tps.training_programs_id LEFT JOIN list_szt szt ON szt.training_programs_id = tps.training_programs_id ORDER BY tps.training_programs_id

SELECT lsiad.student_id FROM list_student_in_admission lsiad JOIN ( SELECT oa.order_admission_id FROM orders_admission oa WHERE oa.department = 1) oai ON oai.order_admission_id = lsiad.order_admission_id

SELECT (((stt.surname::text || ' '::text) || stt.name::text) || ' '::text) || stt.patronym::text AS students, lss.student_id FROM student stt JOIN ( SELECT lsiad.student_id FROM list_student_in_admission lsiad JOIN ( SELECT oa.order_admission_id FROM orders_admission oa WHERE oa.department = 1) oai ON oai.order_admission_id = lsiad.order_admission_id) lss ON lss.student_id = stt.student_id
